text: Disgregus bezarki is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae, and the only species in the genus Disgregus. It was described by Galileo and Martins in 2009.Biolib.cz - Disgregus bezarki. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Desmiphorini Category:Beetles described in 2009 Category:Monotypic beetle genera
title: Disgregus
